stimulusHtml: Discuss TWO possible methods of eradicating or slowing the spread of these ants, including the environmental consequences of each method.

features.html:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Invasive species, such as red fire ants, introduced into an ecosystem often threaten native plants and animals.
